name: Receipt or bill:  when adequate compliance with commercial contract Miscellaneous Provisions
text: §490:7-509  Receipt or bill:  when adequate compliance with commercial contract.  The question whether a document is adequate to fulfill the obligations of a contract for sale or the conditions of a credit is governed by the Articles on Sales (Article 2) and on Letters of Credit (Article 5). [L 1965, c 208, §7-509; HRS §490:7-509]
